page.title: 14Ashcott - Community (cont.)
page.content: It is isolated and adjoins the sports fields.Being upon the hill,it attracts the cold wind.It is subject to {vandalism}and trouble,but despite their efforts,the committee cannot change this. Public{transport }has improved but it is extremely expensive and inconvenient to travel by bus,even if it is reliable.Most people prefer to travel by car within the village. But industries such as Carpenter's are gone,and though the{farms}all remain unchanged,they have no jobs to offer. This explains the absence of certain age groups,who must search for jobs further afield.Most people living in Ashcott work somewhere close such as the shoe businesses in Street.Everyone who lives in Ashcott seem to enjoy it.Ashcott is a centre of activity for neighbouring villages.It is not rough like the{city.
